title: Episode 178: Dillon Francis Shoots To The Moon
itunes:title: Episode 178: Dillon Francis Shoots To The Moon
description:
Dillon takes credit for Spider-Man. Bobo gets a fast pass to a holy place. We talk Taco Bell hot sauce, angry yogis, the baptism of Gilbo Baggins, and a bar mitzvah to remember.

Bonus content every Monday:

https://www.patreon.com/TigerBelly

Sponsor Links:

https://www.ridgewallet.com Promo Code: BELLY

http://tiger.robinhood.com
